addShore

public void addShore(int[] pX,
                     int[] pY,
                     int pNumPoints)
Constructs a polygon out of an array of x cooridinates and y coordinates to properly create the polygon the points must be sent in in the clockwise direction

Parameters:
pX - array of x coordinates
pY - array of y coordinates
pNumPoints - number of vertices in the polygon

Draw the water background and the polygons to a graphics object

Parameters:
g - Graphics object that the weather will be drawn on
playerPos - player position used to calculate relative positions

Mutator for the wind direction should be between 0 and 359

Parameters:
pWindDirection - the new direction for the wind

setWindSpeed

public void setWindSpeed(int pWindSpeed)
Mutator for the wind speed Wind speed is not currently used in the game

Parameters:
pWindSpeed - the new speed for the wind

setTime

public void setTime(int pTime)
Mutator for the environment time 0 = "dawn" 1 = "midday" 2 = "night"

Parameters:
pTime - the new time for the environment

setWorldDimensions

public void setWorldDimensions(int pWidth,
                               int pHeight)
Mutator for the world dimensions

Parameters:
pWidth - the width of the world in "game units" or meters as we like to call them
pHeight - the height of the world in "game units" or meters as we like to call them

setRain

public void setRain(int pRain)
Mutator for the rain turns the rain in the environment on or off 0 = off 1 = on may be made boolean in the future

Parameters:
pRain - integer flag to turn the rain on or off
